entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
